dmca.title: stolen copyrighted material displayed on your customer's website
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme
nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: Austin Hamilton [mailto:austin@austinhamilton.ca] 
Sent: Wednesday, June 06, 2007 9:07 PM
To: Legal; Copyright
Subject: stolen copyrighted material displayed on your customer's
website

Hello,

I'm writing regarding one of your customers, BeadManInc.com
hosted on your server (IP 66.98.208.83).

Content displayed on the website, for example ALL images
displayed on this page:
www.beadmaninc.com/hotnew1.html
were created, are copyrighted, and remain a property of
Austin Hamilton Inc.
There is in total 9 pages of our images being displayed
on Beadman Inc website:
www.beadmaninc.com/hotnew1.html - www.beadmaninc.com/hotnew9.html

These images were illegally stolen/copied from our own website
www.austinhamilton.ca, e.g. from pages:
http://www.austinhamilton.ca/premium_beads.html
http://www.austinhamilton.ca/all_lampwork_beads.html
and then displayed on BeradManInc.com website.

For example - 2nd image on beadman inc. website (marked as VR-02)
was copied from our page:
http://www.austinhamilton.ca/view-b1727-lampworkbeads-en.html


These images were taken, processed and posted by us.
Also, all items shown on these images are owned, copyrighted
and trademarked property of Austin Hamilton Inc.

We are asking you to contact your client, Beadman Inc.
and have them our images REMOVED from their website.
We would really appreciate your cooperation.

Registrant Contact:
   Beadmaninc
   Mangal Das ( )
   +91.5422403095
   Fax: +91.5422403095
   Lallapura, Varanasi, U.P.
   Uttar Pradesh
   Uttar Pradesh, 221002
   IN



Best Regards,
Dan Rokosz
Director
Austin Hamilton Inc.
13700 Mayfield Pl.
Unit 2205
Richmond, BC, V6V 2E4
Canada
Tel: 604-495-6739
Fax: 604-608-2949
